title: Meticulously maintained upgraded home in the community of FoxHill Farm
description: Meticulously maintained and lovingly upgraded home in the community of Fox Hill Farms.  This home has been enhanced with beautiful  hardwood floors throughout the main level.  The entry way welcomes you into the expansive light filled living room.  To the right you will find the updated kitchen with large island, tons of cabinet storage, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and breakfast room all leading to the screened in sunroom.  Sit out in the sunroom and enjoy the peaceful views while drinking your morning coffee or sipping wine at the end of the day without worrying about critters.  The kitchen overlooks the family room featuring a gas fireplace  to keep you warm on those chilly days and nights and lots of windows bringing in natural light.  Off the family room you will find the primary suite with dual closets, built in safe, attached primary bath boasting double sinks, walk-in shower and linen closet.  On the other side of the home you will find an additional bedroom with dual closets and an additional full bath just steps away. You will also find  a laundry room and access to the attached garage.  Another feature of this home is a generously sized finished basement with walk out access to the yard.  This finished area features built in bookshelves and plenty of room for entertaining, hobbies, or just hanging out.  Amenities in this superior neighborhood include a Clubhouse, Community Activities, Indoor and Outdoor Pools, Walking Trails, Library, Tennis courts, Bocce Ball courts, Gym and Game Room.  The HOA covers all your lawn maintenance and landscaping, snow removal and trash pickup.  This home is ready for it's new occupant to move right in and start enjoying carefree living.

title: COZY RIVERWEST STUDIO WITH NEW KITCHEN & BATHROOM – FULLY FURNISHED
description:
Bright, cozy studio apartment for rent at the Riverwest Condominium with good light and views, that comes fully furnished. Large studio unit with functional layout, with a separate study room, and great closet space. Completely renovated kitchen, with black granite countertops, stainless steel sink, backsplash and deep cherry cabinets, stainless steel frig and grey kitchen tile. Renovated bathroom with new vanity, grey tiled floor, wraparound subway tile and bathtub with shower.  Rent is $1,300 per month and includes all utilities. Durable oak hardwood floors and large air conditioning unit. Great building and apartment for graduate students and young professionals. Centrally located, on the Penn shuttle route, with deluxe gym on 2nd floor & restaurant scene at your doorstep.  Apartment is available September 1, 2023 for a 1 or 2-year lease. Apartment is north-facing, with little street noise. Apartment comes fully furnished and is move-in ready, with small rental fee for use of the furniture. (Full furniture list is available). Please text or e-mail Doug for more information.
•Large bright studio (450 Sq. Ft.) with good light & views of the Murano
•ALL UTILITIES INCLUDED in rent (electric, water, heating, air conditioning)
•Comcast equipped -- 7 premium channels, including HBO, included in the rent. 32’’ inch TV included.
•State-of-the-art renovated fitness center
•24 Hour lobby attendant / Security with controlled key access
•Great Center City location, with a great restaurants in the building (Mix) and across the street
•Convenient dining, shopping and entertainment locale (3 blocks from Rittenhouse Square, 1.5 blocks to Trader Joe’s, less than a block from the Stephen Starr restaurant El Rey, Jose Garces’ Village Whiskey and Tinto and the Mutter Museum)
•5 minute commute to Penn/Drexel & Penn Hospital via Penn/Drexel shuttle route
•Walking distance to Jefferson Hospital, Art Institute, SEPTA’s Suburban Station and Amtrak /SEPTA 30th St. Station
•2 Blocks from the fabulous and packed Schuylkill River Banks Running/Walking Path
•Business center with high-speed Internet access with common areas for study sessions
•Large laundry facilities in building
•Minutes to public transportation and major highways
•Contemporary renovated grand lobby & complete on-site management
•Adjacent parking garage available, with discounted monthly charge. Monthly parking garage across the street for roughly $200.
Available September 1, 2023.
Owner lives in Philadelphia; always accessible; this is the only apartment he manages. Additional photos and videos of the building and apartment are available upon request.

title: 2 bd/2 ba No Libs corner unit bathed in natural light! 2 weeks free!
description:
We are moving out of the area and looking for someone to take over our fantastic 2 bed, 2 bath apartment in the heart of Northern Liberties just blocks from the restaurants, coffee shops, grocery stores, vets, shopping, and other neighborhood amenities along 2nd Street and a 10-minute walk to the heart of Fishtown's food, nightlife, and shopping district.
Great location for public transportation with stops for SEPTA's 57 bus and 15 trolley within 1 block of the building, a 10-minute walk to the Girard stop on the Market Frankford Line, and the Girard stop on the Broad Street Line less than 10 blocks away.
And if you have a dog, the apartment is just 3 blocks from the best dog park in the city, Orianna Hill Park. Our pup Chance has been going there for years and we're all going to miss the community at Orianna! There's permit street parking and we are usually able to park within a few blocks of the intersection of 4th and Cambridge; we've found parking to be much easier here than in places like Fairmount and Francisville. And there is quick access to 95 and 676.
The apartment is very comfortable. The master bedroom easily fits a king size bed and has its own bathroom, and the guest room/second bedroom can also fit a king size bed. We have both been able to work from home easily with dedicated work spaces in each bedroom.
There is some flexibility for start date but our preferred is 7/15. If you move in on 7/15, we'll cover the rent for the rest of the month! And for the right applicant who wants to move fast, we are willing to consider additional benefits!
Details:

- 12 month lease
- Available 7/15

- Tenant pays gas and electric

- In-unit washers & dryers
